string-array.name: text_prompts
string-array.item: The most spontaneous thing I've done is:
The best advice I've ever received is:
My guilty pleasure TV show is:
A dream destination I've yet to visit is:
The book that changed my life is:
My favorite way to spend a weekend is:
The most unusual hobby I have is:
The best concert I've ever attended was:
I could talk for hours about:
My ideal Saturday night looks like:
The superpower I'd love to have is:
If I could live in any era, it would be:

resources.string:
Welcome! We're excited to be a part of our community.

Here on Lovorise, we value kindness and respect towards everyone, regardless of their background, beliefs or identity.

To keep Lovorise a safe and inclusive place, please follow our

Our team is here to help whenever you need.

With love, The Lovorise team.

string-array.name: post_account_deletion_messages
string-array.item: You will no longer have access to log in or use any Lovorise services with that account
You will lose access to all your matches
Information that isn't stored in your account, such as direct messages, will not be visible to others
You won't have the option to claim a refund for any items you've bought or received

resources.string: We're sorry to see you go! We'd love to know why you want to delete your account, so we can improve the app and support our community.
If you want to keep your account but prevent others from seeing it, then can pause your account. You can turn this off in the settings.
Resume your account to meet new people. People who you have already liked may still see your profile & match with you.
Your account and data will be deleted permanently.

string-array.item: Swipe as much as you want to explore endless matches.

Accidentally swiped left? Backtrack as much as you need.
Enjoy an uninterrupted dating journey without any ads in your way.

string-array.item: Place documents against a single coloured background

resources.string: Congratulations! Your verification has been successfully completed. Your profile is now verified, and a blue checkmark has been added to your account.

string-array.name: photo_verification_requirements
string-array.item: Write clearly on a paper:\nYour full name, date of birth, location, and today’s date.
Hold the paper visibly in your hand.
Record a short video selfie (your face and the paper must be clearly visible).
Make sure the information matches your ID document and profiles on the app.
